channel.description:

item.title: Help with the following:
item.dc:creator: @deltorz deltorz
item.description:
@deltorz wrote:

go to autospawn.cfg
use this format

spawn = "NPC ID HERE"[tab]"X COORD"[tab]"Y COORD"[tab]0[tab]0[tab]0[tab]0[tab]NAME OF NPC

then open NPC.cfg
find the NPC number and after the name the second number is the health

Then for the prices…
open item.cfg

search for the item you want to change the price for then the three numbers after the name are the prices

for commands…in client.java
search “barrows”
or
“saveme”[br][size=1]Posted on: January 19, 2007, 04:54:11 PM[/size][hr]aww darn u beat me

Read full topic

item.title: Help with the following:
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Ok,
*Adding NPC’s and giving hp!
Go into AutoSpawn.cfg and go to the bottom, right above [ENDOFSPAWNLIST]
Add a NPC’s ID, It might look something like this,

spawn = 494	3253	3418	0	0	0	0	0	1	Varrock Banker East

To give them HP!
Go to npc.cfg and you will see alot of names, numbers and such
on the very right, you will see ‘combat’ and ‘hitpoints’
Don’t change the combat, but you can put what ever amount of hp you want…
But the more hp, the more the str it has

*Altering shop prices!
Go into item.cfg and search for some item you wanna edit, such as whip
What you need here is a calculator…
Decide how much you want it to cost, then divide the number by
1.26875
Put that number in the first 3 number spots…
The first number is shop price,
Secound is low alch price,
Third is high alch price.

*::char that saves!
Add this void

        public void updateCharAppearance(int[] styles, int[] colors) {
		for(int j = 0; j < 7; j++) {
			if(styles[j] > 0) {
				styles[j] += 0x100;
				pCHead  = styles[0];
				pCBeard = styles[1];
				pCTorso = styles[2];
				pCArms  = styles[3];
				pCHands = styles[4];
				pCLegs  = styles[5];
				pCFeet  = styles[6];
			}
		}
		for(int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
			pColor = colors[i];
		}
	}

Search println_debug(“Auto saved game.”);
Or something close to it
and add savechar();

Not 100% on the above… I Don’t remember the void

*Location commands!!!
		else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("CommandNameHere")) {
		teleportToX = XCoordsHere;
		teleportToY = YCoordsHere;
	}

OK, to make this command mod/admin/owner only… add this to CommandNameHere"))
First, take out the last ) and put this in && playerRights >= 1)
1 = mod
2 = admin
3 = owner/co-owner

Read full topic
